other_tests.findings: Prometheus IBD markers were negative, chronic colitis on biopsy and endoscopic findings consistent with chronic colitis.
Thickening of the bowel wall at the splenic flexure and descending colon with minimal fat stranding, which could suggest colitis. No signs of bowel obstruction, free fluid, or free air.

other_tests.procedure_name: Not specified test for salmonella or shigella

other_tests.changes_over_time: Improved with reports of decreased bowel movements and abdominal pain.
